text: This is a list of U.S. state insects. Forty-one of the fifty United States have selected state insects. State State insect Binomial nomenclature Image Year Alabama Monarch Butterfly Danaus plexippus 1989 Alaska Four-Spotted Skimmer Dragonfly Libellula quadrimaculata Arizona Two-Tailed Swallowtail (State Butterfly) Papilio multicaudata Arkansas European honey bee (State Insect) Apis mellifera 1973 Arkansas - State symbols and emblems Arkansas Diana Fritillary Butterfly (State Butterfly) Speyeria diana 2007 California California Dogface Butterfly Zerene eurydice 1972 Colorado Colorado Hairstreak Butterfly Hypaurotis crysalus Connecticut European mantis Mantis religiosa Delaware 7-spotted ladybug (State Bug) Coccinella septempunctata 1974 Delaware Code Title 29 ยง 309 Delaware Eastern Tiger Swallowtail (State Butterfly) Papilio glaucus 1999 Delaware Code Title 29 ยง 315 Georgia European honey bee (State Insect) Apis mellifera 1975State Symbols of Georgia, Georgia General Assembly Georgia Eastern Tiger Swallowtail (State Butterfly) Papilio glaucus 1988State Butterfly , Office of Secretary of State of Georgia website.
